chainsaw.title: C66 UHF RFID Reader (Android 11)
chainsaw.description: Chainway handheld devices based on Android system make your data collection as easy as possible

chainsaw.title: MR20 Wearable RFID Reader
chainsaw.description: Available in various form factors, data capture capabilities and price points, they can be deployed quickly and easily.

chainsaw.title: R6 UHF RFID Sled Reader
chainsaw.description: Deliver flexible UHF data collection function, enhance efficiency, and streamline management.

chainsaw.title: P80 Industrial Tablet (Android 9)
chainsaw.description: Chainway industrial tablets with multiple functions cater to multiple industries

chainsaw.title: V600S Vehicle Computer
chainsaw.description: Chainway vehicle computers bring you security, reliability and flexibility in a safe road traffic

chainsaw.title: R3 Desktop RFID Reader
chainsaw.description: Chainway Fixed UHF RFID Readers feature high stability and powerful RFID performance to maximize efficiency.

chainsaw.title: CP30 RFID Printer
chainsaw.description: Chainway printers are compact, user-friendly, reliable and durable. The printers efficiently print barcodes, RFID tags, bills, wristbands.

chainsawdetail.explain_spec: Android 11; GMS, 90-day security updates, Android Enterprise Recommended, Zero-Touch, FOTA, Soti MobiControl, SafeUEM supported. Committed support for a future upgrade to Android 12, 13, and Android 14 pending feasibility
4200mAh / 5200mAh Removable Main Battery; Support QC3.0 and RTC, Charging time: Only 2.5 Hours; 5200mAh Optional Pistol Battery
Barcode Scanning / UHF RFID / Fingerprint Recognition/ Volume Measurement / NFC / Camera (some are optional)
Screen Protector / Main Battery / Pistol Battery / Charging Cradle / Type C & Pogo Pin I / O Connector / 4-slots Charging Cradle Set / Rugged Rubber Boot with Hand Strap / Belt Clip
Accurate Fingerprint Reading, enables secure data encryption and fake finger detection 5200mAh Removable Main Battery Support Barcode Scanning and NFC
Measurement Speed: up to 2s / piece, Measurement Error<5% Measured Distance: 40cm-4m 5200mAh Removable Main Battery Support Barcode Scanning and NFC
